caption: Veda is great! quick and easy. I love their fresh squeezed juice.
Great selection of products and honestly serves fresher products then most juice bars in Atlanta.

The soup is tolerable the wraps are gross and the juices are great. Probably will only come back for the juice. They put one slice of turkey sandwich meat In a huge wrap. So all that you tasted is bland food and feta cheese.
Nice service ! Acai bowl was amazing!

Delicious fresh food and juice. I got the Start Me Up and Turkey Wrap. Yum! Since sheltering in place my fiancé and I have been walking around the neighborhood to get some fresh air. We ran into this place and decided to try some juice. Glad we did - it’s delicious! Now we go out of our way to make our trips pass by Veda.

I’m a dasher. During this hard time I’m trying to collect as much money as I can to provide for myself. It seems every time I come to this place they never have orders ready but they are always sitting and standing around doing absolutely nothing at all. I don’t find that productive. I don’t appreciate the service at all and personally will never buy anything from this place personally.
Great place

My friend and I decided to visit Veda based on a recommendation from another friend. We arrived at 3:30pm on a Sunday. They close at 4pm. Upon arriving, the wait staff did not greet us in a friendly manner or acknowledge us any way.  Finally we approached lady behind the register when we were ready to order and she was less then friendly. Almost as if they were upset that we were there. After placing our order they did not offer us any where to sit, so we just stood there  and of the workers proceeded to mopping the floors. I work in the service industry and to say I was disappointed by the attitude of the staff is an understatement. I could understand if we came 5 minutes before closing but that wasn’t the case so we just ate in the car. I would give one star but I’m giving 2 because I liked the açaí bowls
Great Facility. Have a great variety of juices and drinks. Highly recommend!

Just stopped by to grab a salad for lunch and a bowl of soup to save for dinner. My southwest salad with chicken was delicious! They also gave me a sample of the soup I ordered (tomato bisque) while I waited and it was stunning. What I appreciate even more than the yummy food, is the excellent customer service. Very attentive staff and extremely helpful!
Bad customer service, the attendant was extremely rude and the smoothie we ordered were not good either.
Great Great Place for freshly squeezed juice
username: Abernathy Capital Advisors Fund Series III LP

caption: The food is good...but the staffs definitely need training when taking order.  I always specify clearly when ordering "No honey", the staff would repeat it and said "got it". But then when I grabbed my acai bowl...there would be honey on top -_-  Of course the staff would help me fix it, but still. My bowl gets contaminated + you wasted honey unnecessarily.  This happened 3 times already...The 4th time almost happened again today. I had to closely monitor the acai bowl being made and yelled "NO HONEY" before the staff was about to squeeze a load onto my bowl....  I get allergic reaction to honey. Please take the customers order seriously.

I love veda and the staff is always so friendly and helpful. My one critique is they use the cheapest plastic bottles for the juices. Please upgrade to a better quality bottle. The tops barely feel tight. These made in China cheepies probably dont preserve the nutrients in the juice very well
Had the bullet proof coffee, acai power bowl and a flu shot! Great way to start the morning, and my body was loving every sip/bite! Will return!
Açaí power bowl is the best 👍🏼
I LOVE VEDA JUICE. The staff is so sweet and helpful. Juices can cure any ailment and make you feel awesome. I tried the wheatgrass, ginger, flu shots....makes me feel awesome!!!You must go!!
Just went there on Saturday and I didn’t know that it was about to close and the girl was so patient and answered all my questions. Great customer service and amazing acai bowls!.
Run

Nice little place with friendly, helpful staff and a well-rounded organic menu of juice, smoothies, and sandwiches. ONLY issue thus far is the acai bowl was too soft and melted too fast. Would prefer a harder freeze so it lasts longer. Perfectly clean store.

The first two times I visited I did so because it is right down the street from where I work and was convenient and the menu seemed appealing and healthy. I had a fine experience the first time with their juices. The second time, I decided to try some of their food. I got the southwestern wrap and loved it. The Third time I returned I got the chicken salad sandwich only because they were "out" of the wraps. That night I was struck with the worst FOOD POISONING you could ever imagine. So bad that I almost got my roommate to take me to the ER. I was out of work and wildly sick vomiting for three full days. I contacted them and spoke with the owner who was very kind and extremely apologetic. she made it clear that they strive to be a place to provide healthy, clean food to their customers and encouraged me to return and try something else on them. Having worked in the food and service industry for a long time, I understood and appreciated her apology, and left it at that. I didn't return for about 2 months after that because I had no desire to relive the situation that I went through the last time. Well today, I visited again because I was craving that southwest wrap, but am trying to go gluten free, so instead got the southwest salad. I was / am wildly disappointed with what I pulled out of the bag upon arriving to work to eat my Lunch. Had I seen it before leaving Veda Juice, I would have kindly refused and not paid NINE dollars +tax for this pathetic salad. Here's what it looks like. I haven't touched it and took photos immediately. The lettuce is mostly brown, the salad appears to be mixed up and looks like it has already been half eaten by someone. If I had time and didn't have to work, I would take it back immediately and demand a refund.
Great smoothie bowls and reasonably priced
Loved my açaí bowl and my husband loved his chicken salad sandwich. And the staff was very friendly and quick.
Great juice. Pick me up is my favorite. Great after a workout. Store is clean and staff is great.
Amazing staff and I love the juices!! I have lived in Atlanta for 3 years now and I have never found a healthy place who’s food tastes as good as Veda Juice.

Oh how funny to read about the changes... Since I could hear as I was leaving my front porch about how unclean and unsafe it is to eat here, from what I’m assuming was the former employees LEAVING.... I overheard them talking about how they are told to reuse latex gloves to save the owner money, the TJ I’m assuming mentioned 👆🏻above adding water to the “fresh pressed” juices, How there is no hot water in the front, which leaves me to question how are they cleaning those blenders that they FREQUENTLY use day in and day out in the front?? CROSS CONTAMINATION ANYONE?!? I also head them say that the sanitation system is improperly installed in the kitchen area. How the food is over priced even tho the owner buys the cheapest produce along with some obscenities about the employees being mistreated and under paid.... And now to think of it I’ve NEVER seen a score from the DOH in the store.... hmmm Close to home or not I’m pretty sure I’ll just stick with Kale Me Crazy!! (Haven’t returned since biting into my frozen CHUNK of Açaí and no Goji berries on my “Berry” Soup.)
So happy I found this place

Unbelievably awful service. I walked in and the woman behind the counter barely turned around to greet me and then asked over her shoulder what I would like. I was the only customer in there. I ordered a coffee and a fruit bowl figuring it would take about 5 minutes. The coffee took 15 minutes to prepare, and I never saw the fruit bowl. I waited 30 minutes and decided to leave. TJ, the guy in the back preparing the food, or not preparing really, came out several times. I have no idea what he was doing back there besides listening to loud music. Three other customers came in and left during the same time without even ordering because nobody even acknowledged they were there. An Uber-eats delivery man was standing with me the entire time asking about the food order he placed. The lady at the front said she couldn't control TJ and he was just taking a long time. Owners, please do something about these employees.
Amazing food, had a wonderful experience, great customer service, and the owner was friendly!
Healthy n fresh
Friendly staff. Great experience. Had the most delicious, satisfying, and generously portioned Acai Berry Bowl yesterday afternoon. As good as it looks...maybe even better!
Lots of options and friendly staff.

I usually get my power shots from Arden's Garden, but today I decided to try Veda Juice. The staff was very friendly, but shortly after taking two wheatgrass shots and an 8 oz. juice, I experienced a bad headache and nausea/vomitting. I read a few articles on some of the possible negative effects of wheatgrass and the most common side effect was headaches/nausea. But this is usually due to the body not being used to wheatgrass and is intolerant of it. I drink the grand slam at Arden's Garden (which includes a shot of wheatgrass) at least 3x a month and never experience these side effects. I've even taken a double grand slam which includes 2 shots of wheatgrass. I continued to read into this and found that another reason I could've expereienced these side effects is if the wheatgrass wasn't cleaned properly and contained a naturally occurring mold that is usually eliminated with proper storage and care of wheatgrass. I'm not going to say that this is entirely the fault of Veda Juice, because it could have been a bad batch, but I vomitted everything I ate today and I normally don't have these issues with wheatgrass from Arden's Garden. $10 gone straight down the toilet and a day's work lost because I had to go home and rest. The employee who made the shots was also not that knowledgeable on how to even make these shots, so it leads me to believe that it probably was a contaminated batch. Other than that, the store was clean. They even have a rewards program and the juices taste pretty good. They would have 5 stars if it weren't for the food poisoning.
All the juices are delicious!
This is the “worst wrap EVER” $9.00 for a turkey wrap with one slice of turkey.  This was a Fooda recommendation at 3 Alliance. I was told what you expect this is not a Big Mac and fries😡

Not happy at all with Service, food Presentation or price. 1-  Standing in line to place my order and they totally skipped me.  I had o tell them I hadn’t ordered. 2- Asked for a Panini w/o tomatoe... they said their warmer wasn’t working. 3-Asked for it cold and they only put cheese on a dry panini bread... nothing else really? 4- I asked for chicken on it...so they put a small portion on it and into a box it went.   No spreads offered.   when I went to eat it the cheese and chicken fell out because the bread wasn’t sliced correctly. 5-  I took one bite and tossed it out because it was not even close to being healthy.  6- All together with chips and juice $20  I do not recommend this service, location or food to anyone.
This place is absolutely amazing!

The Smoothie was good. The Bulletproof coffee, on the other hand, was prepared using, what I am pretty sure, salted butter - no good, Veda, no good at all!  I was already on my way to the train, otherwise, I would have turned around.

The acai power bowl was good but had a big chunk of frozen acai still in it.   They have to let that vitamix do its work. The store wasn't busy so employees should slow down just abit to ensure proper mixing. The "flu shot" was made fresh and is definitely not for the faint of heart. It packs a real flavor punch.

While VEDA has a very nice-looking and clean space including outdoor bistro tables, very friendly and knowledgeable staff, and an appealing menu, it is EXTREMELY overpriced. I paid $13 for the Kale Quinoa Salad with Chicken. While it was good, the portion was extremely small, what I would consider a half salad portion. For $13, any other salad place serves twice the quantity. It is—after all—a salad, not a high-density caloric dish.  Have been looking forward to trying VEDA since it’s around the corner from my house, and finally went for lunch today. While I may  consider going back for a smoothie or juice, I won’t ever bother for a salad / lunch again. Rip off.
Just had my first visit and truly an outstanding experience there! Great service and the smoothies are superb!
Awesome place a must visit. Great service smothies are the best I have had.
Delicious brainboost coffee and tropical smoothie!
Best juice bar in the A .. Try their bullet coffee
Delicious . Great taste
Awesome experience, wonderful owners, and great knowledgeable staff
awesome!
Best fresh organic juice period! Beautiful atmosphere & people.. I'm very thankful to have found this hidden gem.

THE BEST juice/smoothie/salad bar in Atlanta! Knowledgeable and wonderful owners and staff, squeaky clean facility and delicious staples, as well as custom concoctions. A great place for breakfast, lunch or a snack/drink with beautiful outdoor and indoor seating.
